attributes.action: Do not call for a second EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details: Vote leave won, a 2nd voting would be a ludicrous move to make. It is clear that if the figures had been the other way round there would not be a call for 2nd voting. Leave the results as they are and do not change what the public voted for.
attributes.background: The results for the recent EU Referendum were fair. There is no need to for 2nd referendum despite many people believing so. Leaving the EU will open more doors for the future and we should rebuild the strength of our country without the EU.
